summary: changes the drafting tables item to use coal and roll of paper
descriptionHtml:
so i played hearthfire, and went to the drafting table, to find out that i can make a diagram out of air 0_o, so i changed it to require coal and a roll of paper

Update:
the required items can now be found in the following general goods store, each in a bundle of 10:
-The Pawned Prawn
-The Riverwood Trader
-Birna\'s shop in Winterhold (sorry i dont remember the name)
-Bits And Pieces
-Urag at the college
-Niranye\'s stall in Windhelm
-Farengar
-Belethor\'s
-Arnlief and Son\'s in markarth

bugs:
please report if you find any diagrams missing ingredients or the wrong items having those ingredients, i will be happy to fix it :) if i used the wrong item for the crafting please tell me, i used the items: coal01 and paperroll

HEARTHFIRE IS REQUIRED
author: KeizaalFeyn

files.name: hearthfire diagrams require inkwell quill and paper
